results.title: Metformin effect in models of inflammation is associated with activation of ATP-dependent potassium channels and inhibition of tumor necrosis factor-alpha production.
results.text_hl: Altogether, these results stimulate the conduction of studies aiming to evaluate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be repositioned in the treatment of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Somatoform_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013001 @@@painful and inflammatory disorders@@@.

results.title: Metformin antinociceptive effect in models of nociceptive and neuropathic pain is partially mediated by activation of opioidergic mechanisms.
results.text_hl: Altogether, the results indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ should be further investigated aiming its repositioning in the treatment of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with different @<m>DISEASE_Somatoform_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013001 @@@painful conditions@@@.
